Module universityProject
Package usersPackage

Class Dean

java.lang.Object
usersPackage.User
usersPackage.Employee
usersPackage.Dean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>
public class Dean extends Employee
The Dean class represents a dean within an educational institution, extending the functionality of the Employee class.

A dean is responsible for managing student complaints, handling administrative tasks, and overseeing the affairs of a specific faculty.

Additional methods specific to the Dean class, such as handling student complaints and viewing complaints, are provided in this class.

2023-01-01
